Web siteyi hala geliştirme aşamasındayım: I'm still developing the website. Therefore, you may encounter some errors.
Merhaba, ben bir full-stack geliştiriciy: Hello, I'm a full-stack developer, as well as a :php developer and :laravel expert. Besides my interest in pixel art and passion for poetry, I also have a great interest in philosophical thoughts. In the past, I have served as a full-stack developer and team leader.
Göç etmeyi görev edinmiş bir ailenin fer: I am a member of a family that has made migration their mission. The restlessness within me led me to progress on the path of satisfying my hunger for knowledge through coding. Initially, I turned my forced book reading efforts into the center of my life and transformed them into a long-term relationship. This relationship became a tool for me to discover, produce, and express myself.
Kitaplarla geçen zamanın ardından, hayal: After the time spent with books, I sat at the computer to nourish my imagination and direct my energy. I got acquainted with the games offered by the internet and after a while, I stepped into the software world. While initially dealing with game cheats, I started to think bigger about my goals. I got acquainted with web development and then programming languages.
Şu an, felsefe, edebiyat ve yazılım düny: Currently, I am developing myself in the world of philosophy, literature, and software. My biggest goal is to achieve success by using my productivity while enjoying life. My days usually pass with pixel art and software work. Additionally, I turn to various technologies and frameworks with the aim of continuous learning and self-improvement. Learning and putting it into practice is an inseparable part of my life.
Çocukluğumdan beri içerik üretmeyi ve iç: I have loved creating and consuming content since childhood.
